mapper.select: SELECT /* ContestMapper Fix-v1 */ id, name, theme, start_date, end_date, status, created_at, updated_at FROM contests WHERE status IN ('UPCOMING', 'IN_PROGRESS') AND removed_at IS NULL ORDER BY start_date ASC

SELECT id, name, theme, start_date, end_date, status, created_at, updated_at FROM contests WHERE status = 'ANNOUNCED' AND removed_at IS NULL ORDER BY end_date DESC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{size} * #{page}
SELECT * FROM contests WHERE id = #{contestId} AND removed_at IS NULL
SELECT status, start_date, end_date FROM contests WHERE id = #{contestId} AND removed_at IS NULL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO contests (name, theme, start_date, end_date, status, created_by_user_id) VALUES (#{name}, #{theme}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{status}, #{createdByUserId})
mapper.select: SELECT id, name, theme, start_date, end_date, status, created_at, updated_at FROM contests WHERE end_date < CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AND status = 'CLOSED_VOTING' AND removed_at IS NULL ORDER BY end_date ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE contests SET status = #{status, typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumTypeHandler}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{contestId} AND removed_at IS NULL
UPDATE contests SET status = 'IN_PROGRESS' WHERE status = 'UPCOMING' AND start_date <= #{now} AND removed_at IS NULL
UPDATE contests SET status = 'CLOSED_VOTING' WHERE status = 'IN_PROGRESS' AND end_date <= #{now} AND removed_at IS NULL
UPDATE contests SET status = 'ANNOUNCED' WHERE status = 'CLOSED_VOTING' AND aggregation_completed = true AND removed_at IS NULL

UPDATE contests SET name = #{name}, theme = #{theme}, start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, status = #{status, typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumTypeHandler}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id} AND removed_at IS NULL
UPDATE contests SET removed_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{contestId} AND removed_at IS NULL
mapper.select: SELECT id AS contestId, name, theme, start_date AS startDate, end_date AS endDate, status FROM contests WHERE created_by_user_id = #{userId} AND status = 'UPCOMING' AND removed_at IS NULL ORDER BY start_date ASC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM contests WHERE created_by_user_id = #{userId} AND status = 'UPCOMING' AND removed_at IS NULL

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM contests WHERE 1=1
AND removed_at IS NULL
AND status = #{status}
AND (name ILIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR theme ILIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%')
